tech_news.title: Firefox is adding a switch to turn AI features off - The Verge

tech_news.title: Crunchyroll is raising prices again - The Verge
tech_news.description: Crunchyroll is raising prices in the US and “select international markets.” The price hikes will affect all three tiers: the Fan Tier, Mega Fan Tier, and Ultimate Fan Tier.
